room_title: Escape room "Wanted" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: We did Locked and Loaded Saloon. Challenging and loads of fun. We were a group of seven, ages 17 to 73.

room_title: Escape room "Wanted" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: My friends and I did the Wild West room for our annual Christmas party and we had a blast. Our game master Richard did an amazing job with the clues and he made our game so much fun. We are already planning on going back for another room.

room_title: Escape room "Wanted" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: Our family went to Locked 460 to celebrate birthdays. It was our 2nd time. We had so much fun in the WANTED room. Everyone talked about how they liked it more than they thought they would. The rooms are very clean. The staff excellent! I will be checking the website to see room changes and return.

room_title: Escape room "Wanted" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: Of all the escape rooms my group and I have tried so far, this was by far our favorite. We did the Wild West themed room back in January for my boyfriendâ€™s birthday. Our game master was the absolute best and the room was just amazing. Our team escaped with plenty of time to spare!
